title: Add explicit success metric definition & weighting to Fit Score configuration

sections.text: Introduce a required “Success Metric” field in segment/model configuration that defines what the Fit Score is optimizing (e.g., retention, expansion, win rate) and allows weighting if multiple metrics are selected. Persist the definition with the model version and surface it alongside the Fit Score in the UI so all teams see the same objective. This reduces metric disagreements by making the optimization target explicit and auditable.
